name: part_006
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage2 DAY1【チラ見せ】 [qBwpM98PXcI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Commercial featuring various hololive production merchandise from Bandai and Bandai Spirits.
Commercial for Weiβ Schwarz 'hololive production Summer Collection' premium booster pack.
Commercial for Weiβ Schwarz Blau 'HOLOSTARS' start deck and booster pack.
Announcement for hololive Nendoroids in new 'Capture the Moment' outfits by Good Smile Company.
Introduction of hololive prize merchandise from FuRyu available in amusement facilities.
Promotion for hololive production Gawr Gura iPASS cards featuring sushi-themed figures.
Commercial for 'Miru Hako' by JOYSOUND, showcasing a way to enjoy content in karaoke rooms.
Promotion for the Hoshimachi Suisei 1/7 scale figure by Design COCO.
A reel displaying numerous handwritten messages from fans for hololive 5th fes. 'Capture the Moment'.

subtitles.original: ドンジャラNEOホロライブなど、たくさんの商品が発売いたします。
subtitles.english: Many products, including Donjara NEO Hololive, are now on sale.

subtitles.original: バンダイブース、BANDAI SPIRITSブースでは、会場限定グッズも無料配布中！
subtitles.english: At the Bandai and BANDAI SPIRITS booths, limited items are being given away!

subtitles.original: プレバンではすぐに使えるクーポンももらえるチャンス！
subtitles.english: At Premium Bandai, you can get coupons to use immediately!

subtitles.original: ヴァイスシュヴァルツ！
subtitles.english: Weiβ Schwarz!

subtitles.original: 楽しむ準備はいい？
subtitles.english: Are you ready to have fun?

subtitles.original: ヴァイスシュヴァルツの舞台でも、青春しよう！
subtitles.english: Let's experience our youth on the stage of Weiβ Schwarz too!

subtitles.original: プレミアムブースター ホロライブプロダクション Summer Collection、3月22日(金)発売！
subtitles.english: Premium Booster: Hololive Production Summer Collection, on sale Friday, March 22nd!

subtitles.original: ブシロード！
subtitles.english: Bushiroad!

subtitles.original: ホロスターズが、ヴァイスシュヴァルツブラウに登場！
subtitles.english: HOLOSTARS is arriving in Weiβ Schwarz Blau!

subtitles.original: ようこそ、カードゲームの舞台へ！
subtitles.english: Welcome to the stage of card games!

subtitles.original: ヴァイスシュヴァルツブラウ スタートデッキ＆ブースターパック「ホロスターズ」好評発売中！
subtitles.english: Weiβ Schwarz Blau Start Deck & Booster Pack 'HOLOSTARS' are now on sale!

subtitles.original: ブシロード！
subtitles.english: Bushiroad!

subtitles.original: hololive SUPER EXPO 2024開催を記念して、ホロライブメンバーのねんどろいどが、
subtitles.english: To commemorate hololive SUPER EXPO 2024, hololive Nendoroids...

subtitles.original: 新衣装になって再登場！
subtitles.english: ...are returning in their new outfits!

subtitles.original: 新しいねんどろいどをお楽しみに！
subtitles.english: Look forward to the new Nendoroids!

subtitles.original: フリューから「ホロライブ」プライズが、全国アミューズメント施設に、
subtitles.english: hololive prizes from FuRyu are coming to amusement facilities nationwide,

subtitles.original: 2024年7月以降に、続々登場！
subtitles.english: appearing one after another starting from July 2024!

subtitles.original: 今後国内のホロライブメンバー全員展開予定！
subtitles.english: All domestic hololive members are scheduled for release!

subtitles.original: フリュー！
subtitles.english: FuRyu!

subtitles.original: 推しの曲、めっちゃいい...
subtitles.english: My favorite song is so good...

subtitles.original: ね？
subtitles.english: Right?

subtitles.original: みるハコチャーン！
subtitles.english: Miru Hako-chan!

subtitles.original: みるハコなら、臨場感たっぷりで推しのコンテンツが楽しめる！
subtitles.english: With Miru Hako, you can enjoy your favorite content with full presence!

subtitles.original: みるハコ最高！
subtitles.english: Miru Hako is the best!

subtitles.original: 推しとも増やそう！
subtitles.english: Let's increase our circle of fellow fans!

subtitles.original: みるハコ！
subtitles.english: Miru Hako!

subtitles.original: by JOYSOUND！
subtitles.english: by JOYSOUND!
